name: SEPA XML Generator
description: Generates SEPA XML files for credit transfer (SCT) or direct debits (SDD). You can also validate IBANs and generate mandates in PDF format.

api_methods.name: validate-iban
api_methods.description: Validates a set of IBANs. If valid, adds information about the bank that issued it, like BIC, bank name or country code.

api_methods.name: generate-sepa-sdd-file
api_methods.description: Generates an SEPA XML file with direct debits.

api_methods.name: generate-sepa-sct-file
api_methods.description: Generated a SEPA XML file with credit transfers.

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: Retrieve mandate with the given reference.

api_methods.name: validate-iban
api_methods.description: Validates a set of IBANs. If valid, adds information about the bank that issued it, like BIC, bank name or country code.

api_methods.name: generate-sepa-sdd-file
api_methods.description: Generates an SEPA XML file with direct debits.

api_methods.name: generate-sepa-sct-file
api_methods.description: Generated a SEPA XML file with credit transfers.
